text: Samajha lavo ki duni'avi jivana sirafa kheda tamasa ate (nakali) sudarata ate tuhade apasa vica ika dusare te mana jita'una ate ja'idada ate aulada di ika duje nalom age vadhana da yatana hai, jivem sinha (jisa nala phasalam paida hudi'am hana) ki usa di paidavara kisanam nu cagi lagadi hai phira uha suka jandi hai, phira tu usa nu pila dekhada hai' phira uha tila tila ho jandi hai. Ate praloka vica alaha valom kathora saza vi hai ate mu'afi ate prasanata vi. Sasara da jivana dhokhe di daulata tom binham kujha nahim
